00008 require_once 'pear.inc';
00009 require_once 'xmlrpc.inc';

00020 function checkBarcode($barcode, $type = 'upc') {
00021   if (isset($_GET['type'])) {
00022     $type = $_GET['type'];
00023   }
00024 
00025   switch ($type) {
00026     case 'upc':
00030       $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00031       if ($result[1] != 'Error: Invalid length') {
00032         if (strlen($barcode) == 12) {
00033           return 'upca';
00034         }
00035         else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00036           return 'ean13';
00037         }
00038         else {
00039           return FALSE;
00040         }
00041       }
00042       else {
00043         return FALSE;
00044       }
00045       break;
00046     case 'isbn':
00047       if (strlen($barcode) == 10) {
00048         return 'isbn';
00049       }
00050       else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00051         return 'bookland';
00052       }
00053       else {
00054         return FALSE;
00055       }
00056       break;
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00066 function getBarcodeInfo($barcode) {
00067   switch ($_GET['type']) {
00068     case 'upc':
00072       $output = '';
00073       $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00074       $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00075       $output .= '</div>';
00076 
00080       $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00081 //       if ($debug) var_dump($result);
00082       echo getImages($result[1]['description']);
00083       if ($result[1]['found']) {
00084         extract($result[1], EXTR_PREFIX_ALL, 'barcode');
00085         $output .= <<<_HTML
00086         <div id="info">
00087           <table align="center">
00088             <tr>
00089               <td class="title">Country</td>
00090               <td>$barcode_issuerCountry</td>
00091             </tr>
00092             <tr>
00093               <td class="title">Description</td>
00094               <td>$barcode_description</td>
00095             </tr>
00096             <tr>
00097               <td class="title">Size</td>
00098               <td>$barcode_size</td>
00099             </tr>
00100           </table>
00101           <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/editform.asp?upc=$barcode">Modify this entry</a>
00102           <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/deleteform.asp?upc=$barcode">Delete this entry</a>
00103         </div>
00104 _HTML;
00105       }
00106       else {
00107         $output .= 'Product Not Found!<br />';
00108         $output .= '<a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/addform.asp?upc=' . $barcode . '">Add this item to the database</a>';
00109       }
00110       break;
00111 
00112     case 'isbn':
00116       $xml = parseXML('http://isbndb.com/api/books.xml?access_key=' . ISBNKEY . '&index1=isbn&results=texts&value1=' . $barcode);
00117 //       var_dump($xml);
00118 
00119       // Sometimes, the long title is non-existant, so fall back onto the short title
00120       if (strlen($xml->BookList->BookData->TitleLong) != 0) {
00124         $title = $xml->BookList->BookData->TitleLong;
00125       }
00126       else {
00130         $title = $xml->BookList->BookData->Title;
00131       }
00135       $author = $xml->BookList->BookData->AuthorsText;
00139       $publisher = $xml->BookList->BookData->PublisherText;
00143       $summary = $xml->BookList->BookData->Summary;
00147       $isbn = $xml->BookList->BookData['isbn'];
00148 
00152       $output = '';
00153       $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00154       $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00155       $output .= '</div>';
00156       $output .= <<<_HTML
00157       <div id="info">
00158         <table align="center">
00159           <tr>
00160             <td class="title">Title</td>
00161             <td>$title</td>
00162           </tr>
00163           <tr>
00164             <td class="title">Author</td>
00165             <td>$author</td>
00166           </tr>
00167           <tr>
00168             <td class="title">Publisher</td>
00169             <td>$publisher</td>
00170           </tr>
00171           <tr>
00172             <td colspan="2">$summary</td>
00173           </tr>
00174           <tr>
00175             <td class="title">Buy</td>
00176             <td>
00177               <!-- Amazon.com uses the ISBN-10 code, so send it that -->
00178               <a href="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/$isbn/">Amazon.com</a><br />
00179               <!-- Everyone else uses the ISBN-13 code, so send them that -->
00180               <a href="http://search.barnesandnoble.com/booksearch/isbninquiry.asp?ean=$barcode">Barnes & Noble</a><br />
00181               <a href="http://www.booksamillion.com/ncom/books?type=isbn&find=$barcode">Books-A-Million</a><br />
00182               <a href="http://www.google.com/products?q=$barcode">Google Product Search</a>
00183             </td>
00184           </tr>
00185         </table>
00186       </div>
00187 _HTML;
00188       break;
00189   }
00190 
00191   return $output;
00192 }
